languages.text: Using medikits on an ally under the effects of the Master Tactician's {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} abilities heals that target for additional {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} equal to <u>(Master Tactician's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} bonus + target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} bonus)</u> and removes an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g} without any {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g}.
languages.original_text: При использовании медкомплекта на союзнике, на которого действуют способности мастера-тактика, цель дополнительно восстанавливает {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g}, равное <u>(бонус ОБЩ мастера-тактика + бонус ВЫН цели)</u>, и исцеляет дополнительное {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}ранение{/g} без прохождения {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверок{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Using Medikits on an ally under the effects of the Tactician's Doctrine abilities heals that target for additional Wounds equal to <u>(the Tactician's FEL Bonus)+ (the target's TGH Bonus)</u> and removes one extra Injury without any tests.

Using Medikits on an ally under the effects of the Tactician's Doctrine abilities heals that target for additional Wounds equal to <u>(the Tactician's FEL Bonus)+ (the target's TGH Bonus)</u> and removes one extra Injury without any tests.

Using medikits on an ally under the effects of the Tactician's Doctrine abilities heals that target for additional wounds equal to <u>(the Tactician's FEL Bonus)+ (the target's TGH Bonus)</u> and removes one extra Injury without any tests.

Using medikits on an ally under the effects of the Tactician's Doctrine {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} heals that target for additional {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} equal to <u>(the Tactician's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g}) + (the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} Bonus)</u> and removes one extra {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}Injury{/g} without any {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g}.

Using medikits on an ally under the effects of the Master Tactician's {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} abilities heals that target for additional {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} equal to <u>(Master Tactician's FEL bonus + target's TGH bonus)</u> and removes an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g} without any {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g}.

languages.text: При использовании медкомплекта на союзнике, на которого действуют способности мастера-тактика, цель дополнительно восстанавливает {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g}, равное <u>(бонус ОБЩ мастера-тактика + бонус ВЫН цели)</u>, и исцеляет дополнительное {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}ранение{/g} без прохождения {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверок{/g}.
languages.original_text: Using medikits on an ally under the effects of the Master Tactician's {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} abilities heals that target for additional {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} equal to <u>(Master Tactician's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} bonus + target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} bonus)</u> and removes an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g} without any {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g}.

traits.locale_text: При использовании медкомплекта на союзнике, на которого действуют способности тактика, цель дополнительно восстанавливает здоровье, равное <u>({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} ОБЩ тактика + бонус ВЫН цели)</u>, и исцеляет дополнительное ранение без прохождения проверок.

При использовании медкомплекта на союзнике, на которого действуют способности тактика, цель дополнительно восстанавливает здоровье, равное <u>({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} ОБЩ тактика + бонус ВЫН цели)</u>, и исцеляет дополнительное ранение без прохождения проверок.

languages.text: 若盟友受到战术专家{g|Encyclopedia:Career}职业{/g}能力影响，则对该盟友使用医疗包时，可为该盟友恢复更多{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，额外治疗量等同于<u>（战术专家的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}加值）+（目标的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}加值）</u>，并可以在无须任何{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}的情况下，为目标额外消除1处{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}伤势{/g}。
languages.original_text: Using medikits on an ally under the effects of the Master Tactician's {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} abilities heals that target for additional {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} equal to <u>(Master Tactician's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} bonus + target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} bonus)</u> and removes an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g} without any {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 若盟友受到“战术专家”道途的能力影响，则对该盟友使用医疗包时，可为该盟友恢复更多{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，额外治疗量等同于<u>（战术专家的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）+（目标的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}加值）</u>，并可以在无须任何{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}的情况下，为目标额外消除1处伤势。

若盟友受到{g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}战术专家{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Career}职业{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}影响，则对该盟友使用医疗包时，可为该盟友恢复更多{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，额外治疗量等同于<u>（战术专家的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）+（目标的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}加值）</u>，并可以在无须任何{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}的情况下，为目标额外消除1处{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}伤势{/g}。

languages.text: Usar un botiquín sobre un aliado que esté bajo los efectos de las capacidades de {g|Encyclopedia:Career}arquetipo{/g} del maestro táctico cura a ese objetivo tantas {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} adicionales como <u>(bonificación por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}EMP{/g} del maestro táctico + bonificación por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}RES{/g} del objetivo)</u> y elimina una {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lesión{/g} adicional sin necesidad de efectuar {g|Encyclopedia:Test}pruebas{/g}.
languages.original_text: Using medikits on an ally under the effects of the Master Tactician's {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} abilities heals that target for additional {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} equal to <u>(Master Tactician's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} bonus + target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} bonus)</u> and removes an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g} without any {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Usar un botiquín sobre un aliado que esté bajo los efectos de las {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:Career}arquetipo{/g} del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}maestro táctico{/g} cura a ese objetivo tantas {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} adicionales como <u>({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}EMP{/g} del maestro táctico) + (bonificación por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}RES{/g} del objetivo)</u> y elimina 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lesión{/g} adicional sin necesidad de efectuar {g|Encyclopedia:Test}pruebas{/g}.

languages.text: Wenn Medikits auf einen Verbündeten unter dem Einfluss der {g|Encyclopedia:Career}Archetyp{/g}-Fähigkeiten des Meistertaktikers angewendet werden, wird dieses Ziel um zusätzliche {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} geheilt, und zwar in Höhe von <u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}GEF{/g}-Bonus des Meistertaktikers) + ({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}ZÄH{/g}-Bonus des Ziels)</u>, und es wird ohne {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Proben{/g} eine zusätzliche {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}Verletzung{/g} entfernt.
languages.original_text: Using medikits on an ally under the effects of the Master Tactician's {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} abilities heals that target for additional {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} equal to <u>(Master Tactician's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} bonus + target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} bonus)</u> and removes an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g} without any {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Wenn Medikits auf einen Verbündeten unter dem Einfluss der {g|Encyclopedia:Career}Doktrin{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Meistertaktikers{/g} angewendet werden, wird dieses Ziel um zusätzliche {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} geheilt, und zwar in Höhe von <u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}GEF{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} des Meistertaktikers) + ({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}ZÄH{/g}-Bonus des Ziels)</u>, und es wird ohne {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Proben{/g} eine zusätzliche {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}Verletzung{/g} entfernt.

Wenn Medikits auf einen Verbündeten unter dem Einfluss der {g|Encyclopedia:Career}Archetyp{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Meistertaktikers{/g} angewendet werden, wird dieses Ziel um zusätzliche {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} geheilt, und zwar in Höhe von <u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}GEF{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} des Meistertaktikers) + ({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}ZÄH{/g}-Bonus des Ziels)</u>, und es wird ohne {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Proben{/g} eine zusätzliche {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}Verletzung{/g} entfernt.

languages.text: L'utilisation de médikits sur un allié sous l'effet des capacités d'{g|Encyclopedia:Career}archétype{/g} du maître tacticien soigne cette cible pour un nombre de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} supplémentaires égal à <u>(bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}SOC{/g} du maître tacticien + bonus d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}END{/g} de la cible)</u> et supprime une {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lésion{/g} de plus sans lui faire passer de {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}.
languages.original_text: Using medikits on an ally under the effects of the Master Tactician's {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} abilities heals that target for additional {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} equal to <u>(Master Tactician's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} bonus + target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} bonus)</u> and removes an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g} without any {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g}.

traits.locale_text: L'utilisation de médikits sur un allié qui est sous l'effet des capacités de la Doctrine du Tacticien soigne cette cible pour un nombre de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} supplémentaires égal à <u>({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FRA{/g} du Tacticien) + (Bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}RES{/g} de la cible)</u> and supprime une Blessure de plus sans lui faire passer de {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}.

languages.text: 戦略の達人のアビリティ{g|Encyclopedia:Career}タイプ{/g}の効果を受けている味方にメディキットを使用する時、その{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}を<u>(戦略の達人の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g}ボーナス + ターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g}ボーナス)</u>分を追加で回復し、{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}なしで追加で1個の{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}負傷{/g}を取り除く。
languages.original_text: Using medikits on an ally under the effects of the Master Tactician's {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} abilities heals that target for additional {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} equal to <u>(Master Tactician's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} bonus + target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} bonus)</u> and removes an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g} without any {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 戦略の達人のアビリティ{g|Encyclopedia:Career}タイプ{/g}の効果を受けている味方にメディキットを使用する時、その{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}を<u>(戦略の達人のFELボーナス + ターゲットのTGHボーナス)</u>分を追加で回復し、{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}なしで追加で1個の{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}負傷{/g}を取り除く。

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}戦略の達人{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Career}タイプ{/g}の効果を受けている味方にメディキットを使用する時、その{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}を<u>(戦略の達人の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g} + ターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g}ボーナス)</u>分を追加で回復し、{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}なしで追加で1個の{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}負傷{/g}を取り除く。

戦略の達人のアビリティ{g|Encyclopedia:Career}タイプ{/g}の効果を受けている味方にメディキットを使用する時、その{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}を<u>(戦略の達人のFELボーナス + ターゲットのTGHボーナス)</u>分を追加で回復し、{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}なしで追加で1個の{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}負傷{/g}を取り除く。

languages.text: Usta Taktisyen'in {g|Encyclopedia:Career}arketip{/g} kabiliyetlerinin etkisi altındaki bir dost birim üzerinde sıhhiye çantası kullanmak, hedefin <u>(Usta Taktisyen'in {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}SYL{/g} bonusu + hedefin {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}DAY{/g} bonusu)</u> kadar ilave {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık puanını{/g} tazeler ve herhangi bir {g|Encyclopedia:Test}teste{/g} tabi tutmadan fazladan bir {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}sakatlığını{/g} iyileştirir.
languages.original_text: Using medikits on an ally under the effects of the Master Tactician's {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} abilities heals that target for additional {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} equal to <u>(Master Tactician's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} bonus + target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} bonus)</u> and removes an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g} without any {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Usta Taktisyen'in {g|Encyclopedia:Career}arketip{/g} kabiliyetlerinin etkisi altındaki bir dost birim üzerinde sıhhiye çantası kullanmak, hedefin <u>(Usta Taktisyen'in {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}SYL{/g} bonusu + hedefin DAY bonusu)</u> kadar ilave {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık puanını{/g} tazeler ve herhangi bir {g|Encyclopedia:Test}teste{/g} tabi tutmadan fazladan bir {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}sakatlığını{/g} iyileştirir.
